analysis.description: RTNToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/8/0x973ef713673f3bc26a712450eb2d6b1ce534821a.sol#365-368) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0x973ef713673f3bc26a712450eb2d6b1ce534821a.sol:
	Contract RTNToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0x973ef713673f3bc26a712450eb2d6b1ce534821a.sol#167)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

RTNToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/8/0x973ef713673f3bc26a712450eb2d6b1ce534821a.sol#341-347) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x973ef713673f3bc26a712450eb2d6b1ce534821a.sol#343-344)

RTNToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/8/0x973ef713673f3bc26a712450eb2d6b1ce534821a.sol#365-368)
	- /unique_chucks/8/0x973ef713673f3bc26a712450eb2d6b1ce534821a.sol#368
